Package org.apache.sis.gui.coverage

package org.apache.sis.gui.coverage
Widgets showing Grid­Coverage images or sample values.
Since:
1.1

  • Class
    Description
    CoverageCanvas
    A canvas for Rendered­Image provided by a Grid­Coverage or a Grid­Coverage­Resource.
    CoverageExplorer
    An image or tabular view of Grid­Coverage together with controls for band selection and other operations.
    CoverageExplorer.View
    Type of view shown in the explorer.
    GridSliceSelector
    A control for selecting a two-dimensional slice in a grid extent having more than 2 dimensions.
    GridView
    A view of numerical values in a Rendered­Image.
    ImagePropertyExplorer
    Information about Rendered­Image (sources, layout, properties).
    ImageRequest
    A request for a two-dimensional view of a grid coverage.
